name: Vegan Blueberry Cobbler No Oil
description: Easy Vegan Blueberry Cobbler. Oilfree berry cobbler. Crisp and buttery! Gluten-free option. Plant Based Summer Dessert, can be made ahead and versatile. Use blackberries, mixed berries and peaches and other summer fruit. Vegan Soyfree Recipe. Can be made nutfree and Glutenfre
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup unbleached all-purpose flour (, or a mix of whole wheat and all purpose)
3 tbsp almond flour (, or use more flour to make nutfree)
3/4 cup full fat coconut milk ((half coconut cream and half thin milk from a can), see notes for subs)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375 deg F ( 190 C). Add blueberries to a baking dish ( 8-9 inch) or cast iron skillet ( 8 inch). Add lemon zest, juice, sugar and mix well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 375 deg F ( 190 C). Add blueberries to a baking dish ( 8-9 inch) or cast iron skillet ( 8 inch). Add lemon zest, juice, sugar and mix well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add the flours, baking powder, salt, sugar and spice and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add the flours, baking powder, salt, sugar and spice and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/2 cup of the coconut cream+milk mixture and mix in. Add more milk a tbsp to make a thick muffin like mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1/2 cup of the coconut cream+milk mixture and mix in. Add more milk a tbsp to make a thick muffin like mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop spoonfuls of the thick batter on the blueberries. Spread a bit to cover most but not all of the berries. Place the skillet on a baking sheet to catch any spill. Sprinkle a tsp of coconut sugar/other sugar on the batter (optional)
recipeInstructions.name: Drop spoonfuls of the thick batter on the blueberries. Spread a bit to cover most but not all of the berries. Place the skillet on a baking sheet to catch any spill. Sprinkle a tsp of coconut sugar/other sugar on the batter (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 35 mins. Broil for half a minute for browning if needed
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 35 mins. Broil for half a minute for browning if needed

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the oven, let sit for a few mins.. Serve with ice cream or whipped coconut cream. Store: Refrigerate (after cooling completely) for upto 3 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from the oven, let sit for a few mins.. Serve with ice cream or whipped coconut cream. Store: Refrigerate (after cooling completely) for upto 3 days.

keywords: blueberry cobbler, dairy free blueberry cobbler, oil free blueberry cobbler, summer berry cobbler, vegan berry cobbler
